Package in.co.rays.proj0.service

Class UserServiceSpringImpl

java.lang.Object
in.co.rays.proj0.service.UserServiceSpringImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserServiceInt
@Service("userService") public class UserServiceSpringImpl extends Object implements UserServiceInt
Session facade of User Service. It is transactional, apply delcarative transactions with help of Spring AOP. If unchecked exception is propagated from a method then transaction will be rolled back. Default propogation value is Propagation.REQUIRED and readOnly = false
Version:
1.0 (c) SunilOS
Author:
DAO
